div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا كتاب من صيفي بن سالم عامل
الأمير أبي غالب بن الإصبهبذ أعز اللّه
نصره على مدر ورزم براه لمير بن بك
إنّي قبضت منك ممّا صار عليك
من خراج سنة خمس وأربعين ومئة
وسنة ست وأربعين ومئة
وسنة سبع وأربعين ومئة
وتوابعهم
من القسم أربعة دراهم ودانق
قبضت ذلك منك وبرئت
إلي منها وكتب في رجب
سنة تسع وأربعين ومئة
صيفي

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitāb:un min ṣayfiyyi bni sālim:in ʿāmili
ăl ʾamīri ʾabī ġālibi bni ăl ʾiṣbahbaḏi ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu
naṣra hu ʿalà madra wa rizma barāʾaẗ:un li mīri bni baka
ʾin nī qabaḍtu min ka mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka
min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ḫams:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
wa sanaẗi sitt:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
wa sanaẗi sabʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
wa tawābiʿi him
mina ăl qisami ʾarbaʿaẗa darāhima wa dānaq
qabaḍtu ḏālika min ka wa bariʾta
ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī raǧab:in
sanaẗa tisʿ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ṣayfiyy:un

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a document from Ṣayfī ibn Sālim, the financial administrator
of the governor ʾAbū Ġālib ibn al-ʾIṣbahbadh, may God strengthen
his victory, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm, a quittance for Mīr ibn Bēk.
I have received from you what you owe
with regard to the kharāj for the year one hundred and forty-five,
for the year one hundred and forty-six
and for the year one hundred and forty-seven,
and what is linked to these
with regard to portions, four dirhams and one dānaq.
I have received that from yu and you have been released
from (the obligation to pay) them to me. It has been written in Rajab
of the year one hundred and forty-nine.
Ṣayfī
